iPhone 14 price in India discounted by up to Rs 7,000 on JioMart: details here

iPhone 14 is now available at a discounted price through this limited offer.

By
Sai Krishna
-
Published On: November 4, 2022 | Last Updated: January 28, 2023
Highlights
  • iPhone 14 128GB is now available for Rs 77,900 through Jio Mart offline stores.
  • Additionally, there’s a Rs 5,000 instant discount with an HDFC Credit card EMI and full swipe transactions.
  • Jio Mart online is continuing to sell the phone at its launch price of Rs 79,900.

iPhone 14 has gotten its first discount since its launch in September, although it is limited. The iPhone 13 successor is now available for as low as Rs 72,999, including the bank discount, down from its original price of Rs 79,900. The new price is applicable on Jio Mart offline stores and not on Amazon/Flipkart or other platforms, which continue to sell the phone at the original launch price. However, the other iPhone 14 Plus, iPhone 14 Pro, and iPhone 14 Pro Max are available at their original prices.

Show Full Article

The iPhone 14 comes with last year’s Apple A15 Bionic SoC, a 60Hz refresh rate display that has a 6.1-inch screen and 5G network connectivity. Here’s the price break-up for the iPhone 14.

iPhone 14 price breakup

The iPhone 14 originally launched at Rs 79,900 for the standard 128GB storage model. Now, the price has been discounted to Rs 77,900 for the same version on Jio Mart offline stores and not online. In addition to this, there is an instant Rs 5,000 cashback via an HDFC credit card EMI and full swipe.

ModelLaunch priceBank discountSale price
128GBRs 79,900Rs 5,000Rs 72,900

iPhone 14 specifications

The Apple iPhone 14 sports 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED displays with slim bezels, a wide colour gamut, HDR, 1200nits brightness, Face ID sensors, and a standard 60Hz refresh rate. It is powered by the A15 Bionic SoC, with a 5-core GPU for graphics and 16-core NPU. There is 4GB RAM and 128GB, 256GB, and 512GB storage options. It runs on the latest iOS 16 stable version.

Also Read

iPhone 14 Pro shortage likely as China announces lockdown around largest plant: Report

Connectivity options include 5G, Wi-Fi, dual SIM, Bluetooth, GPS, and a Lightning port for charging. Moving to optics, the iPhone 14 comes with dual cameras on the back, with a 12MP wide-angle primary sensor with a larger f/1.5 aperture, sensor-shift OIS, and a 12MP secondary ultra-wide-angle lens. There is support for Dolby Vision for video recording.

There is a 12MP snapper on the front with autofocus for selfies and video chats. Apple says the rear camera offers 38 percent improved low-light performance.
